name: Call of Duty: Black Ops - Escalation
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops - Escalation
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops - Escalation is an action-shooter game developed by Treyarch. It was originally released in 2011. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Call of Duty: Black Ops - Escalation is available on Nintendo DSi, PC and PlayStation 3.
